text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet EDQMUnitOfPresentation

  • Include these codes as defined in http://standardterms.edqm.eu version ⏿5 February 2025
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    15001000ActuationA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is administered following a single operation of a metered-dose pump, valve or other equivalent dosing mechanism.
    15002000AmpouleA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single ampoule container.
    15004000ApplicatorA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single applicator.
    15005000BagA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single bag container.
    15006000BarrelA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single barrel container.
    15007000BlisterA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single blister or unit-dose blister container.
    15008000BlockA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of block.
    15009000BottleA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single bottle container.
    15011000CachetA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of cachet.
    15012000CapsuleA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of capsule.
    15013000CartridgeA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single cartridge container.
    15015000CollarA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of collar.
    15016000ContainerA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single container, where a more-specific container term is not applicable.
    15017000CupA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is administered by filling a single cup administration device.
    15018000CylinderA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single cylinder-type container.
    15019000DartA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single dart container.
    15021000DressingA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of dressing.
    15022000DropA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is administered in a single drop dispensed from a dropper or equivalent administration device.
    15023000FilmA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of film.
    15024000Chewing gumA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of medicated chewing gum.
    15025000ImplantA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of implant.
    15026000InhalerA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single inhaler container.
    15027000InsertA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of insert.
    15028000JarA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single jar container.
    15029000LozengeA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of lozenge.
    15030000LyophilisateA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of lyophilisate.
    15031000MatrixA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of matrix.
    15033000PadA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of pad.
    15034000PaperA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of paper.
    15035000PastilleA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of pastille.
    15036000PatchA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of patch.
    15037000PenA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single pen container.
    15038000PendantA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of pendant.
    15039000PessaryA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of pessary.
    15040000PilluleA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of pillule.
    15041000PipetteA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single pipette administration device.
    15042000PlasterA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of plaster.
    15043000PlugA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of plug.
    15044000PouchA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form or container is a type of pouch.
    15045000SachetA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single sachet container.
    15046000SpongeA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of sponge.
    15047000SpoonfulA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is administered by filling a single spoon administration device.
    15048000StickA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of stick.
    15049000StrawA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single straw container.
    15050000StripA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of strip.
    15051000SuppositoryA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of suppository.
    15052000SyringeA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single syringe container.
    15053000SystemA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of system.
    15054000TabletA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of tablet.
    15055000TagA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of tag.
    15056000TamponA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of tampon.
    15057000ThreadA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of thread.
    15058000TubeA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single tube container.
    15059000VesselA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single vessel-type container.
    15060000VialA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single vial container.
    15061000Puff
    15062000SwabA unit of presentation used to represent the quantity of product that is found in a single discrete entity where the pharmaceutical dose form is a type of swab.

name: EDQMUnitOfPresentationVS
title: EDQM Unit of Presentation ValueSet
description: ValueSet Einheit der Darreichungsform gemäß EDQM, UOP, siehe https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#
